# miRmineR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package exists to easily scrape miRNA-disease association data from databases such as [HMDD](http://www.cuilab.cn/hmdd) or [miRTarBase](http://mirtarbase.cuhk.edu.cn/php/)

## Installation

You can install the latest version of miRmineR from Github with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("jvfe/miRmineR")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
# library(miRmineR)
## basic example code
```
